welcome_message_body: Welcome to Baprola, India! Discover the charm of this vibrant city known for its rich cultural heritage and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Baprola has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves primarily international flights and is the largest terminal at the airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi for up to 45 minutes after which they can purchase additional time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal for low-cost domestic airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
